languages.text: "Пусть мы не понимали деяний Кровавой паутины, но не сомневались, что ткачи исполняют волю Его, ибо они посвящали себя долгу без остатка. Тяжелому долгу, но ведь только такой долг и есть истинный".

traits.locale_text: "Пусть мы не понимали деяний Кровавой паутины, но не сомневались, что ткачи исполняют волю Его, ибо они посвящали себя долгу без остатка. Тяжелому долгу, но ведь только такой и долг и есть истинный".

languages.text: "We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they gave their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."
languages.original_text: "Пусть мы не понимали деяний Кровавой паутины, но не сомневались, что ткачи исполняют волю Его, ибо они посвящали себя долгу без остатка. Тяжелому долгу, но ведь только такой долг и есть истинный".

traits.locale_text: "We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they devoted their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."
"I've always said we'd been destined to meet. The Undying One blessed us, and we've been serving Him loyally to this day."

"We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they gave their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."

"We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they gave their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."

languages.text: « Nous avons peut-être mal compris les agissements de la Toile de Sang, mais nous n'avons jamais douté que les tisseurs accomplissaient Sa volonté, tant ils se dévouent corps et âme à leur devoir. Un devoir accablant, certes, mais une vraie vocation s'apparente toujours à un sacerdoce. »
languages.original_text: "We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they gave their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons peut-être mal compris les agissements de la Toile de Sang, mais nous n'avons jamais douté que les tisseurs accomplissaient Sa volonté, tant ils se dévouent corps et âme à leur devoir. Un devoir accablant, certes, mais une vraie vocation s'apparente toujours à un sacerdoce. »

languages.text: «Puede que no hayamos entendido los actos de la Red Sanguinolenta, pero jamás dudamos que los tejedores llevarían a cabo Su voluntad, siempre lo han dado todo. Es una pesada carga, pero también auténtica».
languages.original_text: "We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they gave their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que no hayamos entendido los actos de la Red Sanguinolenta, pero jamás dudamos que los tejedores llevarían a cabo Su voluntad, siempre lo han dado todo. Es una pesada carga, pero también auténtica».

languages.text: 「我々はブラッドスパン・ウェブの行いを理解できなかったかもしれませんが、織り手たちが主の意志を遂行していたことを疑ったことはありません。彼らは任務のために全てを捧げていましたから。それは責任重要な任務ですが、真の任務というのは常にそういうものでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they gave their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."

traits.locale_text: 「我々はブラッドスパン・ウェブの行いを理解できなかったかもしれませんが、織り手たちが主の意志を遂行していたことを疑ったことはありません。彼らは任務のために全てを捧げていましたから。それは責任重要な任務ですが、真の任務というのは常にそういうものでしょう」

languages.text: “或许我们无法真正理解织血罗网的所作所为，但他们始终履行着神皇的意志，这一点我们从未怀疑过。他们全心全意，将一切献给了职责。他们肩负沉重的责任，但真正的责任就是这么沉重。”
languages.original_text: "We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they gave their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."

traits.locale_text: “或许我们无法真正理解织血罗网的所作所为，但他们始终履行着神皇的意志，这一点我们从未怀疑过。他们全心全意，将一切献给了职责。他们肩负沉重的责任，但真正的责任就是这么沉重。”

languages.text: Vielleicht haben wir die Taten des Blutgesponnenen Netzes nicht verstanden, aber wir haben nie daran gezweifelt, dass die Spinner Seinen Willen erfüllen, denn sie gaben alles, um ihre Pflicht zu tun. Es ist eine schwere Bürde, aber das ist eine wahre Pflicht immer.
languages.original_text: "We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they gave their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."

traits.locale_text: Vielleicht haben wir die Taten des Blutgesponnenen Netzes nicht verstanden, aber wir haben nie daran gezweifelt, dass die Spinner Seinen Willen erfüllen, denn sie gaben alles, um ihre Pflicht zu tun. Es ist eine schwere Bürde, aber das ist eine wahre Pflicht immer.

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı'nın uğraşlarını anlamasak da dokurların O'nun arzularını yerine getirdiklerinden asla şüphe duymadık. Çünkü onlar, kendilerini tamamen vazifelerine adar. Zorlu bir vazife olsa da her daim hakiki bir vazifedir bu."
languages.original_text: "We may not have understood the deeds of the Bloodspun Web, but we never doubted that the spinners carried out His will, for they gave their all to their duty. It is a heavy duty, but a true duty always is."
